<div id="Page2" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div id="a160" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:16px;left:404px;top:990px;">2</div><div id="a162" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:16px;left:310px;top:67px;">THE CATO<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>CORPORATION<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a164" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:bold;left:96px;top:105px;">Item 1.01 Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement </div><div id="a169" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:135px;">On May<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>19, 2022,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>The Cato<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Corporation (the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>&#8220;Company&#8221;), entered<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>into a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>credit agreement<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>(the &#8220;Credit </div><div id="a170" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:152px;">Agreement&#8221;) among the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Company, the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>guarantors party thereto,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the banks party<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>thereto and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Wells<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Fargo </div><div id="a172" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:169px;">Bank,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>National<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Association,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Agent.<div style="display:inline-block;width:12px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Agreement<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>provides<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>for<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>five-year<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>$35.0<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>million </div><div id="a175" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:186px;">unsecured revolving credit facility (the &#8220;Revolving Credit Facility&#8221;). The agreement also provides that the </div><div id="a176" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:203px;">Company<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>may<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>seek<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>increases<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>an<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>amount<div style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:220px;">Revolving Credit Facility does not exceed $75.0 million. </div><div id="a186" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:253px;">Borrowings<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>under<div Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:287px;">Agreement).<div style="display:inline-block;width:4px">&#160;</div>In addition,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>a commitment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>fee accrues<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>with respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>unused amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Revolving </div><div id="a194" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:304px;">Credit Facility at an annual rate of 0.10%. </div><div id="a197" id="a209" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:439px;">consolidated tangible net worth and a minimum coverage ratio of EBITDAR<div contains affirmative, negative and financial covenants<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>customary for </div><div id="a221" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New A<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>copy of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>this Credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Agreement is<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>incorporated<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>as exhibit<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>10.1 </div><div id="a236" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';left:96px;top:605px;">hereto. </div><div id="a239" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:bold;left:96px;top:636px;">Item 1.02 Termination<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>of a Material Definitive Agreement </div><div id="a242" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';left:96px;top:666px;">The disclosure<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>provided in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Item 1.01<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>of this<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Current Report<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>on Form<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>8-K is<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>hereby incorporated<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>by reference<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>into </div><div id="a245" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';left:96px;top:681px;">this Item<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>1.02. Submission of Matters to a Vote<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>of Security Holders. </div><div id="a275" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';left:96px;top:94px;">On<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>May<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>19,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>2022,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Registrant<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>held<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>its<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Annual<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Meeting.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>following<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>are<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>voting<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>results<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>each<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>matter </div><div id="a276" style="position:absolute;font-family:'Times New Roman';left:96px;top:110px;">submitted to the Registrant&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>stockholders at the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Annual Meeting. Roman&apos;;left:358.3px;top:391.4px;">DEFINITIONS </div><div id="a113" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:428.2px;">SECTION 1.01</div><div id="a115" style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>(except<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>otherwise<div id="a123" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:465px;">otherwise requires), have the meanings set forth herein: </div><div id="a125" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:499.4px;">&#8220;Acquisition&#8221; means<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>the acquisition of<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>(i) a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>controlling equity<div similar type security to acquire such a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>controlling interest at </div><div id="a132" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New id="a133" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:554.6px;">exercise of an option or warrant for, or conversion of securities into, such equity interest, or (ii) assets of another </div><div id="a135" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:573px;">Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>which<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:644.2px;">Institution. </div><div id="a141" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:678.6px;">&#8220;Affiliate&#8221;<div by or is<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>under common control with such Person,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or (iii) any other Person of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>which </div><div id="a150" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:733.9px;">such Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>owns, directly<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>or indirectly,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>20% or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>more of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the common<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>stock or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>equivalent equity<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>interests.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>As </div><div id="a153" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:752.3px;">used<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>herein,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>term<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>cause<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a159" </div><div id="a174" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:894.5px;">hereto. </div><div id="a176" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:928.9px;">&#8220;Anti-Corruption Laws&#8221; means: (a) the U.S.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977, as amended; </div><div id="a180" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:947.3px;">(b) the U.K.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.1px">&#160;</div>Bribery Act 2010, as <div style="position:absolute; width:56.8px; height:1px; left:281.4px; top:779.4px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:62.4px; height:1px; left:372.3px; top:779.4px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a187" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">&#8220;Anti-Money<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>Laundering<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>Laws&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>means<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>all<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>laws,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>statutes,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>regulations<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>obligatory </div><div id="a191" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">government orders, decrees, ordinances<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or rules related to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>terrorism financing, money laundering,<div laundering or any financial record keeping, including any applicable provision of the PATRIOT </div><div id="a194" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:104.2px;">Act and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>The Currency<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>and Foreign<div <div id="a354" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">&#8220;Benchmark Replacement&#8221; means, with respect to any Benchmark Transition Event for the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Agent and Borrower </div><div id="a360" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">as<div syndicated credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>facilities and (b) the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>related Benchmark </div><div id="a374" style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>if such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Benchmark Replacement<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>as so<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>determined would<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>be less<div of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>the then-current </div><div id="a384" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:248.9px;">Benchmark with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>an<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Unadjusted<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Benchmark lease of property that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>would, in accordance with FASB<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>ASC 842, be </div><div id="a587" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:156.9px;">required to be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>classified and accounted<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>for as a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>finance lease or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Type<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>A lease (but<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>excluding, for the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>avoidance </div><div id="a589" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:175.3px;">of doubt, any operating lease or Type B lease). </div><div id="a592" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:209.7px;">&#8220;Capital Lease<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Obligations&#8221; means,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>with respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>to any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Capital Lease,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>the amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>the obligation </div><div id="a594" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:228.1px;">of the lessee thereunder that would, in accordance<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>with GAAP,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>appear as a liability on the balance sheet<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of such </div><div id="a595" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:246.5px;">lessee in respect of such Capital Lease. </div><div id="a597" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:280.9px;">&#8220;Capital Stock&#8221;<div partnership,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>membership and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>other interests<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div </div><div id="a603" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:317.8px;">without<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>limitation,<div administration of this Agreement and the other Loan Documents). </div></div>
</div>
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page7" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div id="a685" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">&#8220;Consolidated Operating Profits&#8221; means, for<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>any period, the Operating Profits<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>of Borrower and its </div><div id="a693" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">Consolidated Subsidiaries. </div><div id="a695" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:101.8px;">&#8220;Consolidated Subsidiary&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:3.2px">&#160;</div>means at any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>date any Subsidiary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>or other entity<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the accounts of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>which, </div><div id="a701" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:120.1px;">in accordance with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>GAAP,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>would be consolidated<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>with those of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Borrower in its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>consolidated and consolidating </div><div id="a705" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:138.5px;">financial statements as of such date. </div><div id="a707" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:172.9px;">&#8220;Consolidated Tangible Net Worth<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>&#8217;&#8217; means Net Worth<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>less all Intangible Assets. </div><div id="a718" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:207.3px;">&#8220;Consolidated Total Assets&#8221; means, at any time, the total assets of Borrower and its Consolidated </div><div id="a726" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:225.7px;">Subsidiaries, determined on a consolidated<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>basis, as set forth or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>reflected on the most recent<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>consolidated balance </div><div id="a727" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:244.1px;">sheet of Borrower and its Consolidated Subsidiaries, prepared in accordance with GAAP. </div><div id="a732" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:278.5px;">&#8220;Controlled<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Group&#8221;<div Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:683.4px;">&#8220;Default&#8221; means any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>condition or event<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>which constitutes an<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Event of Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>or which with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a927" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:701.9px;">giving of notice or lapse of time or both would, unless cured or waived in writing, become an Event of Default. </div><div id="a930" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:736.3px;">&#8220;Default Rate&#8221; means, with respect to any Revolving Credit Advance, on any day, the sum of 2% </div><div id="a935" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:754.5px;">plus<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>then<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>highest<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>rate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>(including<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>the<div style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:772.9px;">hereunder (irrespective of whether any such type of Loan is actually outstanding hereunder). </div><div id="a939" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:807.3px;">&#8220;Defaulting Bank&#8221; means, any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Bank that (a) has<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>failed to (i) fund<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>non-recurring expenses<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>at Borrower&#8217;s<div New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:786.5px;">cash charges<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>or expenses<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>relating to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>stock based<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>compensation (but<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>excluding any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>non-cash charge<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>or expense </div><div id="a1155" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:804.9px;">that represents an<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>accrual for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>a cash expense<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to be taken<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>in a future<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>period), plus<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>(d) the Gross<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Rental Expense, </div><div id="a1157" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:823.3px;">all as determined in accordance with GAAP. </div><div id="a1159" </div><div id="a1164" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:876.1px;">EEA<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Member<div </div><div id="a1167" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:912.9px;">or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(c)<div <div id="a1173" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">&#8220;EEA<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>Member<div <div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page11" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:57px; height:1px; left:658.5px; top:868.9px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a1309" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">&#8220;Federal Funds<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Rate&#8221; means,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>for any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>day,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>the rate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>per annum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>(rounded upward,<div New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">the next higher 1/100th of 1%) equal<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>to the weighted average of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>rates on overnight Federal funds transactions </div><div id="a1313" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New </div><div id="a1316" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:122.5px;">the day for which such rate is to be determined is not a Domestic Business Day,<div New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:671.4px;">&#8220;Restricted Payment&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>means<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(i) style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>on any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>shares of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>Borrower&#8217;s </div><div id="a2274" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:689.9px;">capital stock (except dividends payable solely in shares of its capital stock) or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>(ii) any payment on account of the </div><div id="a2275" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:708.3px;">purchase,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>redemption,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>retirement<div id="a2279" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:726.7px;">acquired upon the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>conversion thereof<div Borrower&#8217;s capital stock. </div><div id="a2286" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:779.5px;">&#8220;Revolving<div id="a2290" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:797.9px;">pursuant to Section<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>2.01.<div Rate Loan; (ii) a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>&#8220;Daily Simple SOFR Advance&#8221; if such Revolving Credit Advance is a<div </div><div id="a2371" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:175.3px;">&#8220;Revolving Credit<div principal amount of all Letter of Credit Advances; and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>(iii) the aggregate Undrawn </div><div id="a2572" style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>provision<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>hereof<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Borrower </div><div id="a2717" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:836.9px;">requests<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>an<div effect </div><div id="a2725" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:910.5px;">and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>applied<div </div><div id="a2762" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:212.1px;">SECTION 1.03</div><div id="a2764" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:212.1px;">Use of Defined Terms<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.7px">&#160;</div>.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>All terms defined in this Agreement shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>have the </div><div id="a2767" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New require. </div><div id="a2771" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:283.3px;">SECTION 1.04</div><div id="a2773" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:283.3px;">Terminology.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div>All personal pronouns used in this<div are for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>convenience </div><div id="a2782" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:338.6px;">only, and neither limit nor amplify the provisions of this Agreement. </div><div id="a2784" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:373px;">SECTION 1.05</div><div id="a2786" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:373px;">References.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.3px">&#160;</div>Unless<div id="a2810" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:444.2px;">SECTION 1.06</div><div id="a2812" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:444.2px;">Divisions.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>For all purposes under the Loan Documents, in connection with </div><div id="a2814" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:462.6px;">any division<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>or plan<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>division<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>under Delaware<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>law<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>any comparable<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>event<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>under a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>different<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>jurisdiction&#8217;s </div><div id="a2816" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:481px;">laws): (a) if any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>asset, right, obligation<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>or liability of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Person becomes the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>asset, right, obligation or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>liability </div><div id="a2817" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:499.4px;">of a different Person, then it shall be deemed to have been transferred from the original Person to the subsequent </div><div id="a2819" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:517.8px;">Person, and (b)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>if any new Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>comes into existence, such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>new Person shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>deemed to have<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>been organized </div><div id="a2820" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:536.2px;">on the first date of its existence by the holders of its equity interests at such time. </div><div id="a2822" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:570.6px;">SECTION 1.07</div><div id="a2824" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:570.6px;">Rates.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.2px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>does<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>not<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>warrant<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>accept<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>responsibility<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>for,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>and </div><div id="a2828" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:589px;">shall not have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any liability with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>respect to, (a)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the continuation of,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>administration of, submission<div matter related to Daily Simple SOFR, SOFR, the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Term SOFR Reference Rate</div><div id="a2842" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times may not be adjusted pursuant to Section<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>8.03, will be similar to, or produce the same </div><div id="a2871" <div id="a2972" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">SECTION 1.08</div><div id="a2974" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:48.9px;">Pro Forma<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Adjustments for<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Acquisitions.<div </div><div id="a3000" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:104.2px;">Consolidated Tangible<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Net first day of such four-Fiscal Quarter period. </div><div id="a3026" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:230.5px;">SECTION 1.09</div><div id="a3028" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:230.5px;">Timing of Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or Performance.<div of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>any covenant, duty, or obligation is stated to be due<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a3033" a Business Day, the date of such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>payment or performance </div><div id="a3034" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:304.2px;">computing interest or fees, as the case may be. </div><div id="a3039" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:366.9px;top:338.6px;">ARTICLE II </div><div id="a3041" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:357.2px;top:375.4px;">THE CREDITS </div><div id="a3043" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:412.2px;">SECTION 2.01</div><div id="a3045" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:412.2px;">Commitments to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Make Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Credit Advances.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.4px">&#160;</div>Each Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>severally </div><div id="a3048" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:430.6px;">agrees, on the terms and conditions set forth<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>herein, to make Revolving Credit Advances to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Borrower from time </div><div id="a3052" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:449px;">to time<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>before the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>Termination<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Date; provided<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>that, immediately<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>after each<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>such Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Credit Advance<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>is </div><div id="a3056" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:467.4px;">made,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>outstanding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Advances<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>together<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>with </div><div id="a3057" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New outstanding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>principal amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>all Letter of Credit<div of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>its Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Credit Commitment,<div Banks<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>at such time.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>Each Revolving Credit Borrowing under this<div principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>$500,000 or any<div may borrow under this Section, repay or,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>to the extent permitted by Section 2.10, </div><div id="a3084" </div><div id="a3086" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:685.8px;">SECTION 2.02</div><div id="a3088" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New (Winston<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.7px">&#160;</div>-Salem, North<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Carolina time)<div Borrowing; </div><div id="a3134" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:896.9px;">(iii)</div><div id="a3136" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times <div id="a3309" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">the Agent shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>be entitled to<div during the period from<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the date of any such demand<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>until such </div><div id="a3315" style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>full at a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>rate per annum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>equal to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>rate set forth<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>in Section 2.06.<div Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:722.7px;">Letters of Credit. </div><div id="a3429" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:756.9px;">(a)</div><div id="a3431" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:793.7px;">3.03. </div><div id="a3439" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.2px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.2px">&#160;</div>each<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>that<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>has<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>purchased<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>a </div><div id="a3551" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:683.4px;">participation<div </div><div id="a3559" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:756.9px;">Bank will return to the Agent any portion thereof previously distributed by the Agent to it. </div><div id="a3561" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:791.3px;">(h)</div><div id="a3563" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:809.7px;">payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any<div of such matters. </div><div id="a3571" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:862.5px;">SECTION 2.04</div><div id="a3573" equal<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>to the </div><div id="a3581" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:933.7px;">original principal amount of such Bank&#8217;s Revolving Credit Commitment. </div></div>

to Section 3.01,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the Agent shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>deliver such </div><div id="a3593" style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>irrevocably </div><div id="a3619" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:196.1px;">authorized by Borrower and when required. </div><div id="a3627" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:248.9px;">SECTION 2.05</div><div id="a3629" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:248.9px;">Maturity<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div>of<div New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:320.2px;">SECTION 2.06</div><div id="a3642" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:320.2px;">Interest Rates.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a3645" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:354.6px;">(a)</div><div id="a3647" per<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>annum equal to (i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>in the case of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Revolving </div><div id="a3655" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:373px;">Credit Advances maintained as (A) Base Rate Advances,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>0.00%, and (B) Daily Simple SOFR Advances or Term </div><div id="a3662" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:391.4px;">SOFR Advances, 1.00% and (ii) in the case of calculating the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>unused fee pursuant to Section 2.07(a), 0.10% per </div><div id="a3669" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:409.8px;">annum.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a3672" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:444.2px;">(b)</div><div id="a3674" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:444.2px;">During each<div Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>Credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Advance is<div Base<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Rate for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>such day plus<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>the Applicable Margin.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a3679" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:499.4px;">Any overdue principal of and, to the extent permitted by applicable law, overdue interest on any Base Rate Loan </div><div id="a3680" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:517.8px;">shall bear<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>interest, payable<div </div><div id="a3682" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:536.2px;">Rate. </div><div id="a3684" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>outstanding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>thereof,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a3695" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:607.4px;">Interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Period<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>thereto,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>at<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>rate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>per<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>annum<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>equal<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>Daily<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>day<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>plus<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a3700" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:625.8px;">Applicable Margin.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div>Any overdue principal of and, to the extent permitted by applicable law, overdue interest on </div><div id="a3707" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:644.2px;">any Daily Simple SOFR Loan shall bear interest,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>payable on demand, for each day until<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>paid in full at a rate per </div><div id="a3713" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:662.6px;">annum equal to the Default Rate. </div><div id="a3715" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:697.1px;">(d)</div><div id="a3717" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:697.1px;">During each Interest Period in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>which a Revolving Credit Advance is<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>a Term<div </div><div id="a3724" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:733.9px;">applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>thereto,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>per<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>annum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>equal<div interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>on any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>Term<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>SOFR Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>shall bear </div><div id="a3735" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:770.7px;">interest, payable on demand, for each day until paid at a rate per annum equal to the Default Rate. </div><div id="a3737" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New shall be payable for each Interest Period </div><div id="a3745" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:823.3px;">on the<div termination. </div><div id="a3756" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:912.9px;">(f)</div><div id="a3758" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times the Base Rate, plus the Applicable Margin for Daily Simple SOFR Loans. </div></div>

<div id="a3770" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">(g)</div><div id="a3772" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:48.9px;">The Agent shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>determine each interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>rate applicable to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the Loans hereunder.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>The Agent </div><div id="a3775" interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>so determined,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>and its </div><div id="a3780" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">determination thereof shall be conclusive in the absence of manifest error. </div><div id="a3782" interest on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any Loan shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>bear interest payable<div accrue<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>after the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>filing by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>or against<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Party of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any </div><div id="a3797" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:230.5px;">petition seeking any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>relief in bankruptcy<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>or under any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>act or law<div </div><div id="a3801" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:283.3px;">SECTION 2.07</div><div id="a3803" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:283.3px;">Fees.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a3806" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:317.8px;">(a)</div><div id="a3808" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:317.8px;">Borrower shall pay to the Agent for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the ratable account of each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>Bank an unused fee equal </div><div id="a3811" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:336.2px;">to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>product<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>of:<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>(i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>daily<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>average<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>amounts<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Bank&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>Unused<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>Credit </div><div id="a3813" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:354.6px;">Commitment, times (ii) 0.10% per annum.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.1px">&#160;</div>Such unused fee shall accrue from and including the Closing Date to </div><div id="a3824" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:373px;">and including the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>Termination Date.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>Unused fees shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>be payable quarterly<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>in arrears<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>on each Quarterly<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Payment </div><div id="a3826" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:391.4px;">Date and on the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Termination Date; provided that should the Revolving Credit Commitments<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>be terminated at any </div><div id="a3827" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:409.8px;">time prior to the Termination<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>Date for any reason, the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>entire accrued and unpaid<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>fee shall be paid<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>on the date of </div><div id="a3829" Amounts<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>at any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>one<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>time </div><div id="a3952" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:370.6px;">outstanding shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>at any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>time exceed<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>the aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Credit Commitments<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>of all<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>of the </div><div id="a3954" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:389px;">Banks at such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>time, Borrower shall immediately<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>repay so much of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>the Revolving Credit Advances<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>as is necessary </div><div id="a3960" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:407.4px;">in order<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>that the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>aggregate principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Credit Advances<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>thereafter outstanding,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>together </div><div id="a3961" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:425.8px;">with the aggregate principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>amount of the Letter<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>of Credit Advances and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Undrawn Amounts shall not<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>exceed the </div><div id="a3962" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:444.2px;">aggregate amount of the Revolving Credit Commitments of all of the Banks at such time. </div><div id="a3965" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:478.6px;">SECTION 2.12</div><div id="a3967" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:478.6px;">General Provisions as to Payments.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a3970" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:513px;">(a)</div><div id="a3972" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:513px;">Borrower shall make<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>each payment of principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of, and interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>(Winston-Salem, North Carolina<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>time) on the date when<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>due, in Federal or </div><div id="a3979" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:549.8px;">other funds<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>immediately available<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>in Winston<div Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>at its<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>address referred<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div>Subject to the terms of Section 2.02(d), the Agent will promptly distribute to each Bank its ratable </div><div id="a3985" Banks. </div><div id="a3991" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:657.8px;">(b)</div><div id="a3993" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:657.8px;">Whenever any payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>of principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of, or<div <div id="a4042" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">receipts and other documents evidencing such<div style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">necessary in order that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the amount received<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by such Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>after the required<div no </div><div id="a4048" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:104.2px;">withholding or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>deduction of style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:122.5px;">Borrower shall furnish any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Bank, at such Bank&#8217;s request, a certificate<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>from each applicable taxing authority<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>or an </div><div such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Bank, in either case<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>stating that such payments<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>are exempt from </div><div id="a4055" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:159.3px;">or not subject to withholding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or deduction of Taxes<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div>If Borrower fails to provide such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>original or certified copy </div><div id="a4063" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:177.7px;">of a receipt evidencing<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>payment of Taxes<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>or certificate(s) or opinion<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of counsel of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>exemption, Borrower hereby </div><div id="a4067" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:196.1px;">agrees to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>compensate such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Bank for,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>and indemnify<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>them with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>respect to,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>the tax<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>consequences of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Borrower&#8217;s </div><div id="a4071" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:214.5px;">failure to provide evidence of tax payments or tax exemption. </div><div id="a4074" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:248.9px;">In the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>event any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Bank receives<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>a refund<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of any Taxes<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>paid by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Borrower pursuant<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>to this<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Section </div><div id="a4078" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:267.3px;">2.12, it will<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>pay to Borrower the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>amount of such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>refund promptly upon<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>receipt thereof; provided,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>however, if<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>at </div><div id="a4088" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:285.7px;">any time<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>thereafter it<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>is required<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>to return<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>such refund,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Borrower shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>promptly repay<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>to it<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of such </div><div id="a4093" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:304.2px;">refund. </div><div id="a4096" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:338.6px;">Without prejudice<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>to the survival of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any other agreement of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Borrower hereunder,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the agreements </div><div id="a4100" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:357px;">and obligations<div required by such provisions<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>(i) shall be made based upon the </div><div id="a4105" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New </div><div id="a4109" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:446.6px;">SECTION 2.13</div><div id="a4111" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New <div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page29" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div id="a4184" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">fifteen (15)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Domestic Business<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Days before<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>making a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>request to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>any Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>that is<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>not already<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>a Bank.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>An existing </div><div id="a4185" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">Bank shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>have priority<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>over<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Additional<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Banks to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>participate in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>requested<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Commitment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Increase if<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>such </div><div id="a4187" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">existing Bank provides written notice of its election to participate within fifteen (15) Domestic Business Days of </div><div id="a4188" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:104.2px;">such existing<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Bank&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>receipt of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>such notice.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.8px">&#160;</div>Such notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>from Borrower<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>shall specify<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the requested<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>amount of </div><div id="a4192" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:122.5px;">the Commitment Increase.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>No Bank shall have any obligation to become an<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Increasing Bank.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.2px">&#160;</div>Any fees paid by <div id="a4310" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">pursuant<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>to<div Default </div><div id="a4318" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:104.2px;">has occurred<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>and is<div <div id="Page31" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">

<div id="a4423" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">(d)</div><div id="a4425" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:48.9px;">receipt<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>certificate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>(the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>&#8220;Closing<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>Certificate&#8221;),<div <div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page32" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:282.1px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:209.7px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:226.4px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:655.4px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:226.4px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:818.5px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a4588" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">Each Revolving Credit Borrowing hereunder shall be deemed to be a representation and warranty </div><div id="a4590" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>date<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>such<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">specified<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>clauses<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>(b),<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>(c)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>and<div
