style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:363.7px;top:531.4px;">ARTICLE IV </div><div id="a4635" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:260px;top:568.2px;">REPRESENTATIONS<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>AND WARRANTIES </div><div id="a4638" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:605px;">The Loan Parties represent and warrant that: </div><div id="a4641" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:639.4px;">SECTION 4.01</div><div id="a4643" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:639.4px;">Corporate Organization<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>and Power.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.8px">&#160;</div>Each Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Party (i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>is a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>corporation, </div><div id="a4646" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:657.8px;">limited<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>partnership<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>limited<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>liability<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>company<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>duly<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>organized,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>formed<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>registered,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>applicable,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>validly </div><div id="a4650" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:676.2px;">existing and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>in good<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>standing under<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the laws<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>of its<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>jurisdiction of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>incorporation or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>organization, as<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>applicable, </div><div id="a4651" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:694.7px;">and (ii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>is qualified<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to do<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>business and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>is in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>good standing<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>in every<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>other jurisdiction<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>in which<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the nature<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of its </div><div id="a4653" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:713.1px;">business or the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>ownership of its<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>properties requires it<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>to be so<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>qualified and where<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>failure to so<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>qualify would have </div><div id="a4654" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:731.5px;">a Material<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Adverse Effect.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Each Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Party has<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the requisite<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>power and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>authority and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>the right<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>to own<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>and operate </div><div id="a4657" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:749.9px;">its properties, to lease the property it operates under lease, and to conduct its business as now and proposed<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>to be </div><div id="a4659" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:768.3px;">conducted. </div><div id="a4661" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:802.5px;">SECTION 4.02</div><div id="a4663" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:802.5px;">Litigation; Government Regulation.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.5px">&#160;</div>There is no action,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>suit or proceeding </div><div id="a4666" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:820.9px;">pending, or to the knowledge of the Loan Parties threatened, against<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or affecting the Loan Parties or any of their </div><div id="a4667" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:839.3px;">respective Subsidiaries before<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any court or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>arbitrator or any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>governmental body,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>agency or official<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>which could </div><div id="a4669" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:857.7px;">have a Material<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Adverse Effect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>or which in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any manner draws<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>into question the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>validity or enforceability<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of, or </div><div id="a4670" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:876.1px;">could impair<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>ability<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Loan Parties<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>to perform<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>their<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>respective<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>under,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>this<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Agreement, the </div><div id="a4673" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:894.5px;">Notes or any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of the other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Loan Documents.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.5px">&#160;</div>No Loan Party<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>is in violation<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>of or in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>default under any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>applicable </div><div id="a4676" style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or regulation of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>governmental body (including any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>court) where </div><div id="a4679" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:931.3px;">such violation would have a Material Adverse Effect. </div></div>

<div style="position:absolute; width:71.5px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:885.7px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a4683" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">SECTION 4.03</div><div id="a4685" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:48.9px;">Taxes.<div style="display:inline-block;width:15.5px">&#160;</div>There<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>have<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>been<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>filed<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.2px">&#160;</div>on<div Federal, state and local income, excise, sales, property and other tax returns<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>which are </div><div id="a4695" style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>imposition<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a4757" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:617px;">properties or assets of any Loan Party or any Subsidiary of a Loan Party, except Permitted Liens. </div><div id="a4760" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:651.4px;">SECTION 4.05</div><div id="a4762" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:651.4px;">Governmental Authorization.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>No to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>any Plan,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>and no<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>termination style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>not,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of<div id="a4869" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:517.8px;">valuation date, exceed the then<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>current value of the assets<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of such Plan allocable to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>such benefits.<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>made on<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>or before<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>the due<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>date thereof<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of all amounts<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>that under the terms of each Plan to have paid as contributions to such Plan. </div><div id="a4877" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:589px;">(b)</div><div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>file any </div><div id="a4987" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:409.8px;">such financing statement.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.4px">&#160;</div>Each Loan Party enjoys<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>peaceful and undisturbed possession<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>under all of its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>material </div><div id="a4991" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:428.2px;">leases and all such leases are valid and subsisting and in full force and effect.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.7px">&#160;</div>Each of the Loan Parties and their </div><div id="a4994" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:446.6px;">respective Subsidiaries has title to its properties sufficient for the conduct of its business. </div><div id="a4996" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:481px;">SECTION 4.12</div><div id="a4998" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:481px;">Use of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Proceeds.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>Borrower&#8217;s uses of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>the proceeds of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>each Revolving Credit </div><div id="a5003" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:499.4px;">Advance made by Banks<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>to Borrower pursuant to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>this Agreement are, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>continue to be,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>legal and proper uses </div><div id="a5004" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:517.8px;">and such uses are and will be consistent with the terms of Section 5.15 and all applicable laws and statutes,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>as in </div><div id="a5006" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:536.2px;">effect from time to time. </div><div id="a5008" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:570.6px;">SECTION 4.13</div><div id="a5010" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:570.6px;">Environmental<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>Matters.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>Except<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>would<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>not<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.3px">&#160;</div>individually<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a5013" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:589px;">aggregate have a Material Adverse Effect:<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.4px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a5015" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:623.4px;">(a)</div><div id="a5017" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:623.4px;">No Hazardous Materials have been or are being used, produced, manufactured, processed, </div><div id="a5018" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:641.8px;">treated, recycled, generated, stored,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>disposed of, managed or<div style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:660.2px;">from or located on any Property<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(except in compliance with applicable Environmental<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Laws) and no part of any </div><div id="a5021" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New thereon and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>thereunder, is<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>presently known by<div a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Loan Party<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>during the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>time of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>that Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>Party&#8217;s </div><div id="a5099" Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>Party nor<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>any Subsidiary<div designated as<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>a potentially<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>responsible party under </div><div id="a5123" style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>identified<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>on any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>current or<div CERCLIS list or (iii) any list arising from a state statute similar to CERCLA. </div><div id="a5130" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:407.4px;">SECTION 4.14</div><div id="a5132" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:407.4px;">Assets<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>for<div Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:678.6px;">Contracts.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>No Loan Party<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>is a party<div Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:749.9px;">SECTION 4.17</div><div id="a5177" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:749.9px;">Subsidiaries.<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:786.5px;">organized, validly existing<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>and in good<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>standing could not,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>in the aggregate, have a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Material Adverse Effect.<div Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:931.3px;">Not an Investment Company.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.9px">&#160;</div>No Loan Party nor any Subsidiary of a Loan </div><div id="a5208" Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:48.9px;">Public Utility Holding<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Company Act.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>No Loan Party nor<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>any Subsidiary of </div><div id="a5222" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">a Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:138.5px;">Insolvency.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>After giving<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>effect to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>be </div><div id="a5265" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:175.3px;">&#8220;insolvent&#8221;, within style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:193.7px;">2 of the Uniform Fraudulent Transfer<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Act, or any other applicable state law pertaining to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>fraudulent transfers, as </div><div id="a5271" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:212.1px;">each may<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>be amended<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>from time<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>to time,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>or be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>unable to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>pay its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>debts generally<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>as such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>debts become<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>due, or </div><div id="a5272" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:230.5px;">have an unreasonably small capital to engage in any business or transaction, whether current or contemplated. </div><div id="a5275" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:264.9px;">SECTION 4.21</div><div id="a5277" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:264.9px;">Labor<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Matters.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.8px">&#160;</div>There<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>are<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>no<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>significant<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>strikes,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>lockouts,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>slowdowns<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a5280" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:283.3px;">other labor disputes against any Loan Party or any Subsidiary of any Loan Party pending or, to the knowledge of </div><div id="a5283" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:301.8px;">any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Loan Party,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>threatened<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>which would<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>have a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Material Adverse<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Effect.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.9px">&#160;</div>The hours<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>worked by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>payment </div><div id="a5286" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:320.2px;">made to employees of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the Loan Parties and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>each Subsidiary of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Loan Party have not<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>been in violation<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of the </div><div id="a5287" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:338.6px;">Fair Labor Standards Act or any other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>applicable federal, state or foreign law dealing<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>with such matters except to </div><div id="a5289" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:357px;">the extent such violation would not have a Material Adverse Effect. </div><div id="a5291" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:391.4px;">SECTION 4.22</div><div id="a5293" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:391.4px;">Anti-Terrorism Laws.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.9px">&#160;</div>None of the Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Parties, nor any of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>their respective </div><div id="a5297" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:444.2px;">SECTION 4.23</div><div id="a5302" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:444.2px;">Compliance<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.3px">&#160;</div>Sanctions;<div <div id="Page38" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">

<div id="a5387" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:366.5px;top:48.9px;">ARTICLE V </div><div id="a5389" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:359.6px;top:85.7px;">COVENANTS </div><div id="a5391" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:122.5px;">The Loan Parties agree, jointly and severally,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>that, so long as any Bank has any Revolving Credit </div><div id="a5393" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:140.9px;">Commitment hereunder or any Letter of Credit is<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>outstanding or any amount payable under any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Note or Letter of </div><div id="a5394" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:159.3px;">Credit Advance remains unpaid: </div><div id="a5396" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:193.7px;">SECTION 5.01</div><div id="a5398" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:193.7px;">Information.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.9px">&#160;</div>Borrower will deliver to each of the Banks: </div><div id="a5404" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:228.1px;">(a)</div><div id="a5406" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:228.1px;">As<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>soon<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>practicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>event<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>45<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>days<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>after<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>close<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>each<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Fiscal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Quarter </div><div id="a5409" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:246.5px;">(except the fourth Fiscal Quarter in each<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Fiscal Year) of Borrower,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>a consolidated balance sheet of Borrower and </div><div id="a5410" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:264.9px;">its Subsidiaries<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>as of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the close<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Fiscal Quarter<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>and consolidated<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>statements of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>income, retained<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>earnings </div><div id="a5414" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:283.3px;">and cash flows for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>that Fiscal Quarter and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>for the portion of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the Fiscal Year<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>then ended, prepared in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>accordance </div><div id="a5416" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:301.8px;">with GAAP,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>applied on a basis consistent with that of the preceding period or containing disclosure of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>effect </div><div id="a5417" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:320.2px;">on<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>be </div><div id="a5669" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">reasonably requested.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.1px">&#160;</div>The Loan Parties agree to cooperate and assist in such visits and inspections, in each case </div><div id="a5673" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">at such reasonable times and during business hours and as often as may reasonably be desired. </div><div id="a5675" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:120.1px;">SECTION 5.03</div><div id="a5677" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:120.1px;">Minimum EBITDAR<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Coverage Ratio.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.3px">&#160;</div>Commencing as<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>last day<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>of </div><div id="a5682" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:138.5px;">the first<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Fiscal Quarter<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of Fiscal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Year<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>2022, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>in each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>case continuing<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>on the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>last day<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of each<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Fiscal Quarter </div><div id="a5690" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:156.9px;">ending thereafter, the Minimum EBITDAR Coverage Ratio shall not be less than 1.15 to 1.0. </div><div id="a5698" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:191.3px;">SECTION 5.04</div><div id="a5700" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:191.3px;">Acquisitions.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.1px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a5703" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:225.7px;">(a)</div><div id="a5705" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:225.7px;">No Loan Party nor any Subsidiary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>of a Loan Party shall make an Acquisition<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>unless (i) the </div><div id="a5708" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:244.1px;">Acquisition has been approved and recommended by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>board of directors of the Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to be acquired or from </div><div id="a5709" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:262.5px;">which such assets or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>business is to be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>acquired and the line<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>or lines of business<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of the Person to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>be acquired are </div><div id="a5711" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:280.9px;">the same as or reasonably related<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>to one or more line or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>lines of business in which the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Loan Party is engaged on </div><div id="a5712" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:299.4px;">the Closing<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Date, (ii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>no Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or Event<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>shall have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>occurred and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>be continuing<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>either immediately </div><div id="a5714" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:317.8px;">prior to or immediately after giving effect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>to such Acquisition, (iii) the Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>acquired shall be a Subsidiary,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a5715" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:336.2px;">be merged into a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>Loan Party, immediately upon consummation of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>the Acquisition (or if<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>assets are being acquired, </div><div id="a5717" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:354.6px;">the acquiror<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>a Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Party), and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>(iv) after<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>giving effect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>to such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Acquisition: (A)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>the aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Costs of </div><div id="a5718" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:373px;">Acquisition incurred by any Loan Party or any Subsidiary of a Loan Party in any single transaction or in a series </div><div id="a5720" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:391.4px;">of related transactions shall not<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>exceed $50,000,000; and (B) the aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Costs of Acquisition incurred by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a5721" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:409.8px;">Loan Parties and all Subsidiaries of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Loan Parties during any Fiscal Year<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>shall not exceed $75,000,000 in the </div><div id="a5722" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:428.2px;">aggregate. </div><div id="a5725" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:462.6px;">(b)</div><div id="a5727" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:462.6px;">Not<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>less<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>than<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>ten<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>(10)<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.2px">&#160;</div>Domestic<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.4px">&#160;</div>Business<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>consummation<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>violated<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>after<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>giving<div id="a5739" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:536.2px;">(calculated pursuant to Section 1.08) to such Acquisition. </div><div id="a5742" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:570.6px;">SECTION 5.05</div><div id="a5744" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:570.6px;">Minimum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Consolidated Tangible<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>Net Worth.<div $190,000,000,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>plus, (b) if<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.7px">&#160;</div>Net Income<div id="a5762" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:607.4px;">January 28,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>2023 and thereafter<div Fiscal Year, </div><div id="a5773" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:625.8px;">(c) minus, the<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:644.2px;">plans, not to exceed $10,000,000 per Fiscal Year<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>ending after January 29, 2022. </div><div id="a5781" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:678.6px;">SECTION 5.06</div><div id="a5783" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:678.6px;">Restrictions on Dividends,<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>etc.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>No Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Party nor any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>Subsidiary of a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Loan </div><div id="a5791" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:697.1px;">Party shall: </div><div id="a5793" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:731.5px;">(a)</div><div id="a5795" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:731.5px;">with respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>to Borrower, declare<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>or pay<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>any dividends<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>(other than<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>dividends payable<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>solely </div><div id="a5798" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:749.9px;">in its own Capital Stock) upon any of its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Capital Stock unless, at such time, no Default or Event<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of Default shall </div><div id="a5799" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:768.3px;">exist or would exist immediately after the payment of such dividend; or </div><div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>Stock (or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>options or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>rights to<div distribution<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of property or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>assets (other than as </div><div id="a5818" </div><div id="a5821" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:926.5px;">SECTION 5.07</div><div id="a5823" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:926.5px;">Banking<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div>Relationship.<div style="display:inline-block;width:18px">&#160;</div>The<div <div style="position:absolute; width:56.8px; height:1px; left:307.8px; top:978.5px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a5844" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">The timing<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>for such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>transfer shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>be made<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>in good<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>faith and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>in the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Loan Parties&#8217;<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>commercially reasonable<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>business </div><div id="a5849" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">judgement.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a5851" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:101.8px;">SECTION 5.08</div><div id="a5853" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:101.8px;">Intentionally Omitted.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a5856" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:136.1px;">SECTION 5.09</div><div id="a5858" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:136.1px;">Intentionally Omitted. </div><div id="a5861" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:170.5px;">SECTION 5.10</div><div id="a5863" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:170.5px;">Investments.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>No Loan Party nor<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>any Subsidiary of a Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Party shall make </div><div id="a5867" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New <div style="position:absolute; width:106.1px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:136.1px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a6026" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">is<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>subsequently<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">subsequently becomes<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>a Subsidiary,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>the initial<div <div id="a6174" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">statutory or common law provision relating<div id="a6200" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:228.1px;">Liens arising out<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of conditional<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>arrangements </div><div id="a6201" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:246.5px;">for sale of goods entered into<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>by Borrower or any Subsidiary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>in the ordinary course of business<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>to the extent such </div><div id="a6207" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:264.9px;">Liens do<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>not attach<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>to any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>assets other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>than the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>goods subject<div not<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>intended as<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>security </div><div id="a6208" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:283.3px;">for financing transactions; </div><div id="a6211" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New $2,000,000; </div><div id="a6216" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:370.6px;">(o)</div><div id="a6218" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times documentary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>trade letters of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>credit permitted </div><div id="a6243" <div style="position:absolute; width:62.1px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:830.5px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a6353" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">5.14, a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>transfer,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>lease or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>other disposition<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>of assets;<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>provided that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>fair market<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>value<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of all<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>assets </div><div id="a6361" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">disposed of in<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>any such Fiscal<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Year shall not exceed 10% of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Consolidated Total </div><div id="a6367" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">Assets at the end of the most recent Fiscal Year<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>immediately preceding such Fiscal Year<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.8px">&#160;</div>. </div><div (i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>in connection<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>with, either<div in Section 4980B. </div><div id="a6474" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:814.5px;">SECTION 5.17</div><div id="a6476" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:814.5px;">Insurance.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.2px">&#160;</div>Notwithstanding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>provision<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>in<div or amounts of insurance, each Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Party will maintain, and will cause each Subsidiary </div><div id="a6483" exercise<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>any one or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>all of them<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>at the request<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of the </div><div id="a7161" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:623.4px;">Required<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Banks.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.7px">&#160;</div>Notwithstanding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>foregoing,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>available<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>it<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>all<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>rights<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>remedies </div><div id="a7164" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:641.8px;">provided under the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Loan Documents and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>in addition<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>thereto, all other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>rights and remedies<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>at law or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>equity,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>and </div><div id="a7165" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:660.2px;">the Agent shall exercise any one or all of them at the request of the Required Banks. </div><div id="a7168" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:694.7px;">SECTION 6.02</div><div id="a7170" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:694.7px;">Notice of Default.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div>The Agent shall give notice to Borrower of any Default </div><div id="a7176" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:713.1px;">under Section<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>6.01(c) promptly<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>upon being<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>requested to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>do so<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Bank and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>thereupon notify<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>all the </div><div id="a7180" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:731.5px;">Banks thereof. </div><div id="a7182" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:765.9px;">SECTION 6.03</div><div id="a7184" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:765.9px;">Cash Cover.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>If any Event<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of Default shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>have occurred and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>be continuing, </div><div id="a7187" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:784.3px;">Borrower shall,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>if requested<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Agent, pay<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Agent, for<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>the benefit<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Banks an<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>amount in<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>immediately </div><div id="a7190" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:802.5px;">available funds (which funds shall be held as collateral pursuant to arrangements satisfactory<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>to the Agent) equal </div><div id="a7191" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:820.9px;">to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>aggregate Undrawn<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Amounts, provided<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>that, if<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>any Event<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>specified in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>clause (g)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>or (h)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>above </div><div id="a7193" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:839.3px;">occurs, Borrower shall be obligated<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>to pay such amount to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Agent forthwith without any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>notice to Borrower or </div><div id="a7201" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:857.7px;">any other act by the Agent. </div><div id="a7205" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:892.1px;">SECTION 6.04</div><div id="a7207" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:892.1px;">Allocation of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Proceeds.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.6px">&#160;</div>If an<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Event of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Default has<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>occurred and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>not been </div><div id="a7210" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:910.5px;">waived, and the maturity<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of the Notes has been<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>accelerated pursuant to Article<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>VI hereof, all payments<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>received </div><div id="a7211" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:928.9px;">by the Agent hereunder, in respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of any principal of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>or interest on the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Obligations or any other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>amounts payable </div><div id="a7213" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:947.3px;">by Borrower or any other Loan Party hereunder, shall be applied by the Agent in the following order: </div></div>

<div id="a7221" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">(a)</div><div id="a7223" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:361.2px;top:489.8px;">ARTICLE VII </div><div id="a7277" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:363.4px;top:526.6px;">THE AGENT </div><div id="a7279" Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:563.4px;">Appointment and Authority.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a7287" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New </div><div id="a7295" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:616.2px;">authorizes<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Wells<div Agent </div><div id="a7299" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:653px;">by the terms<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>hereof or thereof,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>together with such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>actions and powers<div of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>this Article<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>are solely<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:689.9px;">Issuing Banks<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>and their<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>respective Related<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Parties, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>neither Borrower<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>nor Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:742.7px;">It is<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>understood and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>agreed that<div &#8220;agent&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>herein or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>in any<div Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:761.1px;">Documents (or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>any other<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>similar term)<div is<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>not intended<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>to connote<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>any fiduciary<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a7323" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:779.5px;">other implied (or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>express) obligations arising<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>under agency doctrine<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of any applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>law.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Instead such term<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>is </div><div id="a7327" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:797.9px;">used as a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>matter of market custom,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>and is intended<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>to create or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>reflect only an<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>administrative relationship between </div><div id="a7328" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:816.3px;">contracting parties. </div><div id="a7331" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:850.5px;">SECTION 7.02</div><div id="a7333" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:850.5px;">Rights as a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Bank.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>The Person serving<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>as the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>hereunder shall have<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a7336" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:868.9px;">same rights and powers in its capacity as a Bank as any other Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and may exercise the same as though it were </div><div id="a7344" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:887.3px;">not the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>and the term<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>&#8220;Bank&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.4px">&#160;</div>or &#8220;Banks&#8221; shall,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>unless otherwise expressly<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>indicated or unless<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the context </div><div id="a7349" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:905.7px;">otherwise requires, include<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the Person serving as<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>the Agent hereunder in<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>its individual capacity.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.3px">&#160;</div>Such Person and </div><div id="a7351" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:924.1px;">its Affiliates<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>may accept<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>deposits from,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>lend money<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to, own<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>securities of,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>act as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the financial<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>advisor or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>in any </div><div id="a7352" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:942.5px;">other advisory capacity for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and generally engage in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any kind of banking, trust,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>financial advisory,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>underwriting, </div><div id="a7354" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:960.9px;">capital markets<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>such Person </div></div>
</div>
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page51" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:149.8px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:117.7px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:64.7px; height:1px; left:427.5px; top:984.1px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a7360" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">were not<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>hereunder and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>without any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>duty to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>account therefor<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Banks or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to provide<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>notice to<div style="display:inline-block;width:3.9px">&#160;</div>with respect thereto. </div><div id="a7369" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:101.8px;">SECTION 7.03</div><div id="a7371" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:101.8px;">Exculpatory Provisions. </div><div id="a7374" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:136.1px;">(a)</div><div id="a7376" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:136.1px;">The<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Agent,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>their<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>respective<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Related<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Parties<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>not<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>duties<div thereunder </div><div id="a7380" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:172.9px;">shall be administrative in<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>nature.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>Without limiting the generality of<div fiduciary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>or other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>implied duties,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Banks (or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>such other number </div><div id="a7457" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:713.1px;">or percentage of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the Banks<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>as shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>necessary,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>or as the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Agent shall believe<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>in good<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>faith shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>necessary, </div><div id="a7461" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:731.5px;">under the circumstances as provided in Section 9.05) or (ii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>in the absence of its own gross negligence or willful </div><div id="a7465" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:749.9px;">misconduct<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>determined by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>court<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>competent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>jurisdiction<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by final<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>non-appealable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>judgment.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.9px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Agent </div><div id="a7468" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:768.3px;">shall be deemed<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>not to have knowledge<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of any Default or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Event of Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>unless and until notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>describing such </div><div id="a7470" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:786.5px;">Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Default<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>indicating<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>given<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by </div><div id="a7471" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:804.9px;">Borrower,<div style="display:inline-block;width:4px">&#160;</div>a Bank or an Issuing Bank.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.2px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a7479" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:839.3px;">(c)</div><div id="a7481" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:839.3px;">The Agent,<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.8px">&#160;</div>and their<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>respective Related<div for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>or have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>any </div><div id="a7486" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times Document,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>(ii) the </div><div id="a7498" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:894.5px;">contents of <div id="a7520" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">receipt of items<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>expressly required to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>be delivered to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>the Agent<div Commitment (it being understood and agreed that each Issuing Bank shall monitor compliance with its </div><div id="a7536" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">own Letter of Credit Commitment without any further action by the Agent). </div><div id="a7542" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:120.1px;">SECTION 7.04</div><div id="a7544" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:120.1px;">Reliance by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the Agent.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11px">&#160;</div>The Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>entitled to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>rely upon,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>shall be </div><div id="a7548" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:138.5px;">fully protected<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>in relying and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>shall not<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>incur any<div style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:156.9px;">communication, statement, instrument, document or other writing (including any<div proper<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Person.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>The Agent also may<div Person, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>shall be fully<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>protected in relying </div><div id="a7557" thereon.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div>In determining compliance with any condition hereunder to </div><div id="a7559" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:248.9px;">the making of a Loan, or the issuance, extension, renewal or increase of a Letter of Credit, that by its terms must </div><div id="a7560" style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>Issuing Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>that has<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>signed<div required<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>thereunder to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>be consented<div </div><div id="a7601" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:433px;">such Bank or Issuing Bank or that is to be acceptable or satisfactory to such Bank or style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:467.4px;">Delegation of Duties.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>The Agent may perform any and all of its duties and </div><div id="a7618" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:485.8px;">exercise its rights and powers hereunder or under any other<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.5px">&#160;</div>The Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>and any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>such id="a7624" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:522.6px;">exercise its rights and powers<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>by or through their<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>respective Related Parties.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>The exculpatory provisions of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>this </div><div id="a7626" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:541px;">Article shall<div
