style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>the Related<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Parties of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>and any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>such sub<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.4px">&#160;</div>-agent, and </div><div id="a7631" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:559.4px;">shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>apply<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>their<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>respective<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>activities<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>connection<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>syndication<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>under<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>this<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>Agreement<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>well<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>as </div><div id="a7635" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:577.8px;">activities as Agent.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>The Agent shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>not be responsible<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>for the negligence<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>or misconduct of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>any sub-agents except </div><div id="a7638" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:596.2px;">to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>extent that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>a court<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>of competent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>jurisdiction<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>determines in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>a final<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>and non-appealable<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>judgment that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a7642" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:614.6px;">Agent acted with gross negligence or willful misconduct in the selection of such sub agents. </div><div id="a7644" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:649px;">SECTION 7.06</div><div id="a7646" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:649px;">Resignation of Agent.<div style="display:inline-block;width:3.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a7649" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:683.4px;">(a)</div><div id="a7651" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:683.4px;">The Agent may<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>at any time<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>give notice of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>its resignation to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the Banks,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>the Issuing Banks </div><div id="a7657" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:701.9px;">and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>Borrower.<div style="display:inline-block;width:12.7px">&#160;</div>Upon<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>receipt<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>resignation,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Required<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Banks<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>have<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>right,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>in </div><div id="a7663" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:720.3px;">consultation<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Borrower,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>appoint<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>successor,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>which<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>financial<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>institution<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>reasonably </div><div id="a7666" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:738.5px;">experienced in serving<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>as administrative<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>agent on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>syndicated bank facilities<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>with an office<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>in the United<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>States, </div><div id="a7667" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:756.9px;">or an Affiliate of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any such bank or financial<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>institution with an office<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in the United States.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.8px">&#160;</div>If no such successor </div><div id="a7669" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:775.3px;">shall have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>been so<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>appointed by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the Required<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Banks and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>shall have<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>accepted such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>appointment within<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>30 days </div><div id="a7673" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:793.7px;">after<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>retiring<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>gives<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>resignation<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>(or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>earlier<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>day<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>agreed<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Required </div><div id="a7674" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:812.1px;">Banks)<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.1px">&#160;</div>(the &#8220;Resignation Effective Date&#8221;), then the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>retiring Agent may (but shall not be obligated<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to), on behalf </div><div id="a7678" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:830.5px;">of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>Banks and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>the Issuing<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>Banks,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.9px">&#160;</div>appoint a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>successor Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>meeting the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>qualifications set<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>forth above.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.2px">&#160;</div>Whether </div><div id="a7685" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:848.9px;">or not a successor has been appointed, such resignation shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>become effective in accordance with such notice on </div><div id="a7686" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:867.3px;">the Resignation Effective Date. </div><div id="a7688" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:901.7px;">(b)</div><div id="a7690" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:901.7px;">If the Person serving as Agent is a Defaulting<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>Bank pursuant to clause (d) of the definition </div><div id="a7695" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:920.1px;">thereof, the Required Banks may, to the extent permitted by applicable law, by notice in writing to Borrower and </div><div id="a7707" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:938.5px;">such Person,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>remove such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Person as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Agent and,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in consultation<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>with Borrower,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>appoint a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>successor.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>If no<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>such </div><div id="a7710" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:956.9px;">successor shall have been so appointed by the Required<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Banks and shall have accepted such appointment within </div></div>

<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page53" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:274.4px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:683.4px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a7715" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">30 days (or such earlier<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>day as shall be agreed<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>by the Required Banks) (the &#8220;Removal<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Effective Date&#8221;), then such </div><div id="a7719" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">removal shall nonetheless become effective in accordance with such notice on the Removal Effective Date.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.7px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a7723" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:101.8px;">(c)</div><div id="a7725" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:101.8px;">With<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>effect<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>Removal<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>Effective<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.1px">&#160;</div>Date<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>(as </div><div id="a7727" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:120.1px;">applicable), (i) the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>retiring or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>removed Agent shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>be discharged<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>from its<div with all of the rights, powers, privileges and duties of the retiring or removed Agent (other </div><div id="a7740" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Documents.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.3px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>fees </div><div id="a7744" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:341px;">payable by Borrower to a successor Agent shall be the same as those payable to its predecessor unless otherwise </div><div id="a7749" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:359.4px;">agreed<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>between<div <div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page54" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">

<div style="position:absolute; width:316.8px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:501.8px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:245px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:904.1px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a7856" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">and information<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>as it<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>has deemed appropriate,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>made its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>own credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>analysis and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>appraisal of,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and investigations </div><div id="a7858" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">into,<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>business,<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>prospects,<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>operations,<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>property,<div style="display:inline-block;width:11px">&#160;</div>assets,<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>liabilities,<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>financial<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:10px">&#160;</div>condition<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>and </div><div id="a7963" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:780.1px;">request into a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>request for<div affected SOFR<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>Loans will be deemed to have been<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>converted into Base Rate Loans (I) with </div><div id="a7966" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:816.9px;">respect to any Daily<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Simple SOFR Loans, immediately and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>(II) with respect to any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Term SOFR Loans, at the end </div><div id="a7968" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:835.3px;">of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.9px">&#160;</div>Upon<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>prepayment or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>conversion,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Borrower shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:12.5px">&#160;</div>No<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>replacement<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>converted to Base<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Rate Loans (I)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>Simple SOFR Loans, immediately and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>(II) with respect to any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Term SOFR Loans, at the end </div><div id="a8164" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:504.2px;">of the applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Interest Period.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>During any Benchmark<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Unavailability Period with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>respect to any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Benchmark </div><div id="a8165" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:522.6px;">or at any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>time that a tenor<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>for any then-current Benchmark<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>is not an Available Tenor, the component of Base Rate </div><div id="a8168" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:541px;">based upon the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>then-current Benchmark that<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>is the subject<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of such Benchmark<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Unavailability Period or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>such tenor </div><div id="a8172" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:559.4px;">for such Benchmark, as applicable, will not be used in any determination of Base Rate. </div><div id="a8174" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:593.8px;">SECTION 8.04</div><div id="a8176" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:593.8px;">Illegality.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.9px">&#160;</div>If, in any applicable jurisdiction, the Agent, any Issuing<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Bank or </div><div id="a8178" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:612.2px;">any Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>determines that<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>any applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>law has<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>made it<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>unlawful, or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>that any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>governmental authority<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>has asserted </div><div id="a8180" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:630.6px;">that it is unlawful, for the Agent, any Issuing Bank or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>any Bank to (i) perform any of its obligations hereunder or </div><div id="a8181" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:649px;">under any<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>other Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>Document, (ii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>to fund<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>or maintain<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>its participation<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>in any<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>Loan or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>(iii) issue,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>make, maintain, </div><div id="a8182" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:667.4px;">fund or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>charge interest or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>fees with<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>respect to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>any extension of<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>credit, such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Person shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>promptly notify<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the Agent, </div><div id="a8184" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:685.8px;">then, upon the Agent notifying Borrower, and until<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>such notice by such Person is<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>revoked, any obligation of such </div><div id="a8187" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:704.3px;">Person to issue, make, maintain, fund or charge interest or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>fees with respect to any such extension of credit shall </div><div id="a8188" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:722.5px;">be suspended,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>extent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>required by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>applicable law,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>cancelled.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.6px">&#160;</div>Upon<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>receipt of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>such notice,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Loan </div><div id="a8190" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:740.9px;">Parties shall, (A) repay<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>that Person&#8217;s participation in the Loans<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>or other applicable Obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>on (I) with respect </div><div id="a8191" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:759.3px;">to any Daily Simple SOFR<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Loan, the applicable Interest Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Date therefor or (II) with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>respect to any Term </div><div id="a8193" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:777.7px;">SOFR<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Loan, the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>last<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>day<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Interest Period<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>therefor,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>another applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>date<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>another </div><div id="a8194" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:796.1px;">Obligation, occurring after the Agent has notified Borrower or, in each case, if earlier, the date specified by such </div><div id="a8198" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:814.5px;">Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>delivered<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>(being<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>no<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>earlier<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>than<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>last<div </div><div id="a8200" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:832.9px;">permitted by Applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>law) and (B)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>take all<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>reasonable actions requested<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>by such Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>to mitigate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or avoid </div><div id="a8201" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:851.3px;">such illegality. </div></div>

<div id="a8205" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:363.7px;top:48.9px;">ARTICLE IX </div><div id="a8207" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:341.3px;top:85.7px;">MISCELLANEOUS </div><div id="a8209" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:122.5px;">SECTION 9.01</div><div id="a8211" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:122.5px;">Notices.<div style="display:inline-block;width:15px">&#160;</div>All<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>notices,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>requests<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.4px">&#160;</div>communications<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>party </div><div id="a8214" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:140.9px;">hereunder shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>in writing (including<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>facsimile transmission or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>similar writing) and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>shall be given<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>to such party </div><div id="a8215" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:159.3px;">at its address or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>telecopy number set forth<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>on the signature pages<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>hereof or such other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>address or telecopy number </div><div id="a8217" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:177.7px;">as such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>party may hereafter<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>specify for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the purpose<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by notice<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>other party.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.4px">&#160;</div>Each such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>notice, request<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a8220" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:196.1px;">other communication<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>shall be effective<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>(i) if<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>given by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>telecopier, when such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>telecopy is<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>transmitted to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>the telecopy </div><div id="a8221" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:214.5px;">number specified<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>in this<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Section and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the telecopy<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>machine used<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>sender provides<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>a written<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>confirmation </div><div id="a8223" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:232.9px;">that such telecopy has been so transmitted or receipt of such telecopy transmission is otherwise confirmed, (ii) if </div><div id="a8224" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:251.3px;">given<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>mail,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>72<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>hours<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>after<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>communication<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>is<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>deposited<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>mails<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>first<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>class<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>postage<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>prepaid, </div><div id="a8226" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:269.7px;">addressed<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>aforesaid,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>(iii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>if<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>given<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>means,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>when<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>delivered<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>at<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>address<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>specified<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>this </div><div id="a8227" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:288.2px;">Section; provided that notices to the Agent under Article II or Article VIII shall not be effective until received. </div><div id="a8232" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:322.6px;">SECTION 9.02</div><div id="a8234" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:322.6px;">No Waivers<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>No failure<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>or delay<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Agent or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>any Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>in exercising </div><div id="a8237" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:341px;">any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>right, power<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>privilege<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>hereunder<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>under<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Note<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Document<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>operate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>as<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>waiver </div><div id="a8239" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:359.4px;">thereof nor<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>shall any single<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>or partial<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>exercise thereof<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>preclude any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>other or further<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>exercise thereof<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>or the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>exercise </div><div id="a8240" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:377.8px;">of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>right,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>power<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>privilege.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.5px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>rights<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>remedies<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>herein<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>provided<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>cumulative<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>not </div><div id="a8243" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:396.2px;">exclusive of any rights or remedies provided by law. </div><div id="a8245" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:430.6px;">SECTION 9.03</div><div id="a8247" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:430.6px;">Expenses: Documentary Taxes:<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Indemnification.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a8250" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:465px;">(a)</div><div id="a8252" <div id="a8318" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">SECTION 9.04</div><div id="a8320" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:48.9px;">Sharing of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>Set-Offs.<div style="display:inline-block;width:3.4px">&#160;</div>Each Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>agrees that<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>if it<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>shall, by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>exercising any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>right </div><div id="a8325" payment of a proportion<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>of the aggregate amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>principal and </div><div id="a8329" style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Letter<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>it<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>which<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>is<div amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of all<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Letter of Credit<div </div><div id="a8335" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:159.3px;">held<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>without the written<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>consent of each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Bank, (viii) change<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a8436" of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the Guaranteed Obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>without the written<div any Subsidiary<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Guarantor that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>is permitted to<div <div id="Page59" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">

<div style="position:absolute; width:151.8px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:260.1px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a8481" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">amount of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>fees payable<div for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>its own<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>account may<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>be amended,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>from time<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to time,<div without the approval of any of the Banks.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.2px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a8487" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New id="a8490" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:120.1px;">Borrower only,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>amend, modify<div from<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the rate at<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>which the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>discretion.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Upon (A)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>execution New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:343.4px;">Bank, such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>Assignee, the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>and (if applicable)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Borrower, (B) delivery of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>an executed copy<div Borrower and the Agent,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>(C) payment by such Assignee to such transferor<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Bank of an amount </div><div id="a8652" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:380.2px;">equal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by the </div><div id="a8654" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Agent if<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>the Assignee<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>is <div id="a8739" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">SECTION 9.08</div><div id="a8741" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:48.9px;">Confidentiality.<div style="display:inline-block;width:17.5px">&#160;</div>Each<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.7px">&#160;</div>Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>each<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>Transferee<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.2px">&#160;</div>agrees<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.7px">&#160;</div>keep<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>any </div><div id="a8747" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">information delivered or made available by the Loan Parties, other than<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any such information that is available to </div><div id="a8752" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">any Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>or Transferee on<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>a nonconfidential<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>basis prior<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>to disclosure<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>by any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Loan Party, confidential<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>from anyone </div><div id="a8761" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:104.2px;">other than persons employed or retained<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>by such Bank who are or are<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>expected to become engaged in evaluating, </div><div id="a8762" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:122.5px;">approving, structuring or administering the Loan; provided, however, that nothing herein shall prevent any Bank </div><div id="a8771" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:140.9px;">from disclosing such information (i) to any other Bank, (ii) upon<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the order of any court or administrative agency, </div><div id="a8773" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:159.3px;">(iii) upon<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the request<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or demand<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>regulatory agency or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>authority having<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>jurisdiction over<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>such Bank,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(iv) </div><div id="a8774" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:177.7px;">which has<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>been publicly disclosed,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>(v) to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>the extent reasonably<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>required in connection<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>with any litigation<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>to which </div><div id="a8776" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:196.1px;">the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>Agent,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>their<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>respective<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>Affiliates<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>may<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>party,<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>(vi)<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>extent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>reasonably<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>required<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>in </div><div id="a8777" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:214.5px;">connection with<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>the exercise<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>remedy hereunder, (vii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>to such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>Bank&#8217;s legal counsel<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>and independent<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>auditors </div><div id="a8780" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:232.9px;">and (viii) to any actual<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>or proposed Participant, Assignee other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Transferee or prospective Transferee of all or part </div><div id="a8785" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:251.3px;">of its rights<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>hereunder which has<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>agreed in writing,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>prior to receipt<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of any such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>information, to be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>bound by the </div><div id="a8789" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:269.7px;">provisions of this Section 9.08 as if it were a Bank hereunder. </div><div id="a8794" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:304.2px;">SECTION 9.09</div><div id="a8796" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:304.2px;">Representation<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.1px">&#160;</div>Banks.<div style="display:inline-block;width:18.1px">&#160;</div>Each<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.1px">&#160;</div>Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div>hereby<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>represents<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.9px">&#160;</div>that<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.1px">&#160;</div>it<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>is<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>a </div><div id="a8799" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:322.6px;">commercial lender or financial<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>institution which makes loans<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>in the ordinary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>course of its business and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>that it will </div><div id="a8800" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:341px;">make<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>its<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Revolving<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Credit<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Advances<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>hereunder<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>for<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>its<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>own<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>account<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>ordinary<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>course<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>business; </div><div id="a8802" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:359.4px;">provided, however,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>that, subject to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Section 9.07, the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>disposition of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Note or Notes<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>held by that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Bank shall at </div><div id="a8809" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:377.8px;">all times be within its exclusive control. </div><div id="a8811" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:412.2px;">SECTION 9.10</div><div id="a8813" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:412.2px;">Obligations Several.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.3px">&#160;</div>The obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Bank hereunder<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>are several, </div><div id="a8816" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:430.6px;">and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>no<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>responsible<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>for<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>commitment<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>hereunder.<div style="display:inline-block;width:12.2px">&#160;</div>Nothing </div><div id="a8819" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:449px;">contained in this Agreement<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and no action taken<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>by the Banks pursuant<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>hereto shall be deemed to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>constitute the </div><div id="a8820" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:467.4px;">Banks to be a partnership, an association,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>a joint venture or any other<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>kind of entity.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>The amounts payable at any </div><div id="a8824" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:485.8px;">time hereunder to each Bank shall be a separate and independent debt, each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Bank shall be entitled to protect and </div><div id="a8825" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:504.2px;">enforce its rights arising out of this Agreement or any other Loan Document and it shall not be necessary<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>for any </div><div id="a8826" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:522.6px;">other Bank to be joined as an additional party in any proceeding for such purpose. </div><div id="a8830" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:557px;">SECTION 9.11</div><div id="a8832" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:557px;">Survival of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Certain Obligations.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.5px">&#160;</div>Sections 8.03(a),<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>8.03(b), 8.05<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>and 9.03, </div><div id="a8837" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:575.4px;">the obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Loan Parties<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>thereunder,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>and Section<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>9.08, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>the obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Banks, Transferees </div><div id="a8841" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:593.8px;">and<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div>prospective<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div>Transferees<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>thereunder<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.4px">&#160;</div>with<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.4px">&#160;</div>respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div>thereto,<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>survive,<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.4px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>continue<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.4px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.4px">&#160;</div>be </div><div id="a8845" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:612.2px;">enforceable notwithstanding, the termination of this Agreement<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>and the Revolving Credit Commitments and the </div><div id="a8846" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:630.6px;">payment in full of the principal of and interest on all Revolving Credit Advances. </div><div id="a8848" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:665px;">SECTION 9.12</div><div id="a8850" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:665px;">North Carolina Law.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.3px">&#160;</div>This Agreement and each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Note shall be construed<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>in </div><div id="a8853" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:683.4px;">accordance with and governed by the law of the State of North Carolina. </div><div id="a8855" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:717.9px;">SECTION 9.13</div><div id="a8857" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:717.9px;">Severability.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.6px">&#160;</div>In case<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>any one<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>or more<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the provisions<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>contained in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>this </div><div id="a8860" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:736.3px;">Agreement,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Notes<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Documents<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>should<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>invalid,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>illegal<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>unenforceable<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>any </div><div id="a8861" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:754.5px;">respect, the validity, legality and enforceability<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>of the remaining provisions<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>contained herein and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>therein shall not </div><div id="a8863" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:772.9px;">in any way be affected or impaired thereby and shall be enforced to the greatest extent permitted by law. </div><div id="a8865" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:807.3px;">SECTION 9.14</div><div id="a8867" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:807.3px;">Interest.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.6px">&#160;</div>In no event shall the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>amount of interest due or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>payable hereunder </div><div id="a8870" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:825.7px;">or under<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the Notes<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>exceed the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>maximum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>rate of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>interest allowed<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>by applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>law,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>and in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>the event<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>any such </div><div id="a8872" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:844.1px;">payment is inadvertently made<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>to any Bank by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Borrower or inadvertently received<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>by any Bank, then<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>such excess </div><div id="a8876" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:862.5px;">sum shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>credited as a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>payment of principal,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>unless Borrower shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>notify such Bank<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>in writing that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>it elects </div><div id="a8880" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:880.9px;">to have such excess sum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>returned forthwith.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.1px">&#160;</div>It is the express intent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>hereof that Borrower not pay<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and the Banks </div><div id="a8886" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:899.3px;">not receive, directly or indirectly in any manner whatsoever,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>interest in excess of that which may legally be paid </div><div id="a8887" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:917.7px;">by Borrower under applicable law. </div><div id="a8892" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:952.1px;">SECTION 9.15</div><div id="a8894" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:952.1px;">Interpretation.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.2px">&#160;</div>No<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>provision<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>this<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Agreement<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>other<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Loan </div><div id="a8897" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:970.5px;">Documents shall be construed against or interpreted to<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>the disadvantage of any party hereto by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>any court or other </div></div>

parent undertaking,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>or a bridge institution<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>that may be<div </div>
