style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>participation<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>in,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>administration<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>performance<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>Loans,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a9137" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:949.7px;">Letters of Credit, the commitments and this Agreement (including in connection with the reservation or exercise </div><div id="a9139" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:968.1px;">of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>rights by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>the Agent under<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>this Agreement,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>any Loan<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Document or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>any documents<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>related hereto or<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>thereto). </div></div>
</div>
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page64" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:131.8px; height:1px; left:287.7px; top:64.9px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a9143" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:48.9px;">SECTION 9.22</div><div id="a9145" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:48.9px;">Erroneous Payments. </div><div id="a9148" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:83.3px;">(a)</div><div id="a9150" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:83.3px;">Each Bank, each<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Issuing Bank, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any other party<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>hereto hereby severally<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>agrees that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>if </div><div id="a9151" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:101.8px;">(i) the Agent notifies (which such notice shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>conclusive absent manifest error) such Bank or Issuing Bank or </div><div id="a9152" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:120.1px;">any other Person that has<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>received funds from the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or any of its Affiliates,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>either for its own account or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>on </div><div id="a9154" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:138.5px;">behalf of a Bank, Issuing Bank (each such recipient, a &#8220;Payment Recipient&#8221;) that the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>Agent has determined in its </div><div id="a9155" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:156.9px;">sole discretion that any funds received by such Payment Recipient were erroneously transmitted to, or otherwise </div><div id="a9157" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:175.3px;">erroneously<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>mistakenly<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>received<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>by,<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.7px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>(whether<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.8px">&#160;</div>not<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>known<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.6px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.7px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:8px">&#160;</div>Payment </div><div id="a9158" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:193.7px;">Recipient) or (ii)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>any Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>receives any payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>from the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(or any of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>its Affiliates)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>(x) that </div><div id="a9159" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:212.1px;">is in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>a different<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>amount than,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>or on<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>a different<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>date from,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>that specified<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>in a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>notice of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>payment, prepayment<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a9161" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:230.5px;">repayment sent by the Agent (or any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>of its Affiliates) with respect to such payment,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>prepayment or repayment, as </div><div id="a9162" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:248.9px;">applicable, (y) that was not<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>preceded or accompanied by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>a notice of payment,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>prepayment or repayment sent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>by </div><div id="a9164" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:267.3px;">the Agent (or any of its<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Affiliates) with respect to such payment,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>prepayment or repayment, as applicable, or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>(z) </div><div id="a9165" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:285.7px;">that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>otherwise<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>becomes<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>aware was<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>transmitted<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>received<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>error<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>mistake<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(in </div><div id="a9167" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:304.2px;">whole or in part) then, in each<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>case, an error in payment shall be presumed<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>to have been made (any<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>such amounts </div><div id="a9168" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:322.6px;">specified in clauses (i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>or (ii) of this Section 9.22(a),<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>whether received as a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>payment, prepayment or repayment of </div><div id="a9171" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:341px;">principal, interest, fees, distribution<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>or otherwise; individually and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>collectively,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>an &#8220;Erroneous Payment&#8221;),<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>then, </div><div id="a9174" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:359.4px;">in each case, such Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>is deemed to have knowledge of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>such error at the time of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>its receipt of such </div><div id="a9175" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:377.8px;">Erroneous Payment;<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>provided that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>nothing in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>this Section<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>shall require<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to provide<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>any of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the notices </div><div id="a9176" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:396.2px;">specified in clauses (i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>or (ii) above.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Each Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>agrees that it shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>not assert any right<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>or claim to </div><div id="a9178" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:414.6px;">any Erroneous<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Payment, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>hereby waives<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>any claim,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>counterclaim, defense<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>or right<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>of set-off<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>or recoupment </div><div id="a9181" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:433px;">with respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>to any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>demand, claim<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>or counterclaim<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>for the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>return of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>any Erroneous<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Payments, including </div><div id="a9183" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:451.4px;">without limitation waiver of any defense based on &#8220;discharge for value&#8221; or any similar doctrine. </div><div id="a9185" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:485.8px;">(b)</div><div id="a9187" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:485.8px;">Without limiting the<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.7px">&#160;</div>immediately preceding<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>clause (a),<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>each Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>Recipient agrees<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>that, </div><div id="a9189" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:504.2px;">in the case of clause (a)(ii) above, it shall promptly notify the Agent in writing of such occurrence. </div><div id="a9191" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:538.6px;">(c)</div><div id="a9193" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:538.6px;">In the case<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>of either clause (a)(i)<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>or (a)(ii) above, such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>Erroneous Payment shall at<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>all times </div><div id="a9196" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:557px;">remain the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>property of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>and shall be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>segregated by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>the Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>and held<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>in trust<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>for the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>benefit </div><div id="a9199" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:575.4px;">of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Agent, and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>upon demand<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>from the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Agent such<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>shall (or,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>shall cause<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>any Person<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>who </div><div id="a9200" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:593.8px;">received<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Erroneous<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>promptly,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>but<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>all<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>events<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>no<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>later<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>than<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>one </div><div id="a9203" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:612.2px;">Domestic Business<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Day thereafter,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>return to<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>the amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>of any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>such Erroneous<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Payment (or<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>portion </div><div id="a9207" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:630.6px;">thereof) as to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>which such a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>demand was made<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>in same day<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>funds and in<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the currency so<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>received, together with </div><div id="a9208" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:649px;">interest thereon in respect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of each day from<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and including the date such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Erroneous Payment (or portion<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>thereof) </div><div id="a9210" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:667.4px;">was<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>received<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>date<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>such<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>is<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>repaid<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>Agent<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>at<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>greater<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a9211" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:685.8px;">Federal Funds Rate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>and a rate<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>determined by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Agent in accordance<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>with banking industry<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>rules on<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>interbank </div><div id="a9212" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:704.3px;">compensation from time to time in effect. </div><div id="a9215" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:738.5px;">(d)</div><div id="a9217" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:738.5px;">In the event that an Erroneous Payment<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>(or portion thereof) is not recovered<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>by the Agent </div><div id="a9218" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:756.9px;">for any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>reason, after<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>demand therefor<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>by the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>Agent in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>accordance with<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>immediately preceding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>clause (c),<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>from </div><div id="a9220" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:775.3px;">any Bank that<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>is a Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>or an Affiliate of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>a Payment Recipient<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>(such unrecovered amount<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>effect as if<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>such </div><div id="a9310" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:469.8px;">payment or satisfaction had never been received. </div><div id="a9312" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:504.2px;">(f)</div><div id="a9314" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:504.2px;">Each<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>party&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:11px">&#160;</div>obligations<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.3px">&#160;</div>under<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>this<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>Section<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>9.22<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>survive<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>resignation<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.2px">&#160;</div>or </div><div id="a9318" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:522.6px;">replacement of the Agent or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>any transfer of right or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>obligations by, or the replacement of, a Bank,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>the termination </div><div id="a9320" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:541px;">of the commitments or the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>repayment, satisfaction or discharge<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>of all Obligations (or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>any portion thereof) under </div><div id="a9321" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:559.4px;">any Loan Document. </div><div id="a9323" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:593.8px;">(g)</div><div id="a9325" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:593.8px;">Nothing in this<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Section 9.22 will<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>constitute a waiver<div Agent </div><div id="a9329" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:612.2px;">hereunder arising from any Payment Recipient&#8217;s receipt of an Erroneous Payment. </div><div id="a9332" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:366.5px;top:646.6px;">ARTICLE X </div><div id="a9334" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:363.1px;top:683.4px;">GUARANTY </div><div id="a9336" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:720.3px;">SECTION 10.01</div><div id="a9338" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:720.3px;">Unconditional<div style="display:inline-block;width:17.9px">&#160;</div>Guaranty.<div style="display:inline-block;width:36.9px">&#160;</div>Each<div style="display:inline-block;width:17.9px">&#160;</div>Guarantor<div style="display:inline-block;width:18px">&#160;</div>hereby<div style="display:inline-block;width:17.7px">&#160;</div>irrevocably, </div><div id="a9341" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:738.5px;">unconditionally and jointly and severally guarantees, each as a primary obligor and not merely as a surety, to the </div><div id="a9343" punctual<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>payment of the principal of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>and the premium, if any, </div><div id="a9344" <div id="a9376" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">The Guarantors further agree, promptly after demand, to pay to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>the Agent, the Issuing Bank and Banks the costs </div><div id="a9379" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New </div><div id="a9389" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:175.3px;">SECTION 10.02</div><div id="a9391" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:175.3px;">Obligations Absolute.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>The obligations of the Guarantors<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>hereunder are and </div><div id="a9395" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:193.7px;">shall be<div effect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>without regard to, and shall<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>not be released, discharged or </div><div id="a9406" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:285.7px;">in any way<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>affected by, to the fullest extent permitted<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>by law, any circumstance or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>condition whatsoever (whether </div><div id="a9408" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:304.2px;">or not any of the Guarantors shall have any knowledge or notice thereof), including, without limitation: </div><div id="a9410" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:338.6px;">(a)</div><div id="a9412" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:192px;top:338.6px;">any amendment<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>or modification<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>of or<div to pursue any other remedy available to the Agent, the Issuing Bank or any such Bank. </div><div id="a9685" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:283.3px;">SECTION 10.05</div><div id="a9687" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:283.3px;">Information<div style="display:inline-block;width:14.7px">&#160;</div>Concerning<div style="display:inline-block;width:15.1px">&#160;</div>Borrower.<div style="display:inline-block;width:30.6px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:15.1px">&#160;</div>Guarantors<div style="display:inline-block;width:14.8px">&#160;</div>assume<div style="display:inline-block;width:15px">&#160;</div>all </div><div id="a9692" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:301.8px;">responsibility for being<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>and keeping themselves<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>informed of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>financial condition and<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>assets of Borrower,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a9695" of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the risks<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>which the<div neither<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the Agent,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>the Issuing<div to any of such circumstances or risks. </div><div id="a9704" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:428.2px;">SECTION 10.06</div><div id="a9706" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:428.2px;">Guarantors&#8217;<div style="display:inline-block;width:3.3px">&#160;</div>Subordination.<div style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:554.6px;">SECTION 10.07</div><div id="a9734" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:554.6px;">Waiver<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>of Subrogation.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.1px">&#160;</div>Until the final and Roman&apos;;left:144px;top:917.7px;">SECTION 10.09</div><div id="a9782" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:288.1px;top:917.7px;">Miscellaneous.<div <div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page69" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div id="a9791" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">Notwithstanding anything<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>in this<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>Article X<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>to the contrary,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>the maximum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>liability of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>each Guarantor<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>hereunder </div><div id="a9792" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:67.3px;">shall in no<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>event exceed the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>maximum amount which<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>could be paid<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>out by such<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>Guarantor without rendering<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>such </div><div id="a9794" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">Guarantor&#8217;s obligations under<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>this Article X,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>in whole<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>or in part,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>void or voidable<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>under applicable<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>law, including, </div><div id="a9797" <div id="a10570" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:350.3px;top:48.9px;">SCHEDULE 1.01 </div><div id="a10572" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:350px;top:83.3px;">Investment Policy </div><div id="a10575" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:373.8px;top:152.1px;">[Attached]</div></div>
</div>
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page80" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:93px; height:1.6px; left:96px; top:154.9px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:299.9px; height:1.6px; left:96px; top:237.5px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:201.3px; height:1.6px; left:96px; top:569.7px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:93px; height:1.6px; left:96px; top:882.4px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a10578" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:18.72px;font-weight:bold;left:287.7px;top:49px;">THE CATO CORPORATION </div><div id="a10580" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:18.72px;font-weight:bold;left:281.5px;top:70.4px;">CASH INVESTMENT POLICY </div><div id="a10582" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:139.7px;">I.<div style="display:inline-block;width:39.9px">&#160;</div>OBJECTIVES </div><div id="a10586" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:172.9px;">The<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>objectives<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>cash<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>investment<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>policy<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>include<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>maximum<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>safety<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>preservation<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>principal, </div><div id="a10587" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:189.7px;">maximum after-tax yield from cash assets and appropriate<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.8px">&#160;</div>liquidity to meet normal cash needs. </div><div id="a10592" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:222.3px;">II.<div style="display:inline-block;width:35.8px">&#160;</div>AUTHORIZED OFFICIALS AND CONTROLS </div><div id="a10597" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:255.4px;">A.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>The Chief Executive<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>Officer, Chief Financial Officer and/or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>Treasurer each may<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>execute a single<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>non-</div><div id="a10601" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:272.2px;">equity investment purchase or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>sale up to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>$10,000,000, and any single<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>purchase or sale transaction </div><div id="a10603" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:289.2px;">in excess<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>$10,000,000 must<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>be approved<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>in writing<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>by two<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the three<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>designated officers<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>and </div><div id="a10604" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:306px;">evidence of such approval must be filed in the company&#8217;s records. </div><div id="a10606" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:338.8px;">B.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>All equity investments, regardless<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>of value, must be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>approved by two of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>the three designated officers </div><div id="a10609" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:355.8px;">listed in A above. </div><div id="a10611" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:388.6px;">C.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>The Treasurer will<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>review a daily<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>summary of investment<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>activity presented<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>in the Investment<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>Position </div><div id="a10615" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:405.5px;">Report to ensure investments adhere to the policy. </div><div id="a10617" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:438.3px;">D.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>The daily administration of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>the investment activities will be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>done under the direction of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>the Treasurer.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a10621" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:455.1px;">In the absence of the Treasurer, the Treasury personnel will perform the daily administration. </div><div id="a10623" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:488.1px;">E.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>Investment activity may<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>be conducted by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>outside managers provided<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>the manager(s) are<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>approved </div><div id="a10627" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:504.9px;">by two<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>of the three<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>designated corporate<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>officers listed<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>in A<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>above.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>The manager<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>must provide,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>under </div><div id="a10628" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:521.9px;">a signed contract, that they will adhere to quality and liquidity<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>guidelines contained in this policy. </div><div id="a10631" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:554.5px;">III.<div style="display:inline-block;width:31.7px">&#160;</div>INVESTMENT PARAMETERS </div><div id="a10635" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:587.5px;">A.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>No investments will be made which violate covenants contained in<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>bank loans or other agreements. </div><div id="a10639" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:620.4px;">B.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>Safety of principal is the primary consideration. </div><div id="a10643" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:653.2px;">C.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>Liquidity must be provided to meet the Company&#8217;s projected cash requirements. </div><div id="a10647" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:686.2px;">D.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>The highest yield should be obtained providing for safety of principal<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>and required liquidity. </div><div id="a10651" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:719px;">E.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>All outside<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>managers<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>are required<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>to<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>conduct sufficient<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>due diligence<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>to support<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>viability of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>an </div><div id="a10655" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:736px;">investment beyond<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>any rating<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>assigned by<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>rating agencies<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>and provide<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>Cato with<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>an outline<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>of the </div><div id="a10656" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:752.8px;">due diligence procedures followed. </div><div id="a10658" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:785.6px;">F. </div><div id="a10660" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:785.6px;">No foreign currency based investments are permitted. </div><div id="a10663" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:818.6px;">G.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div>No manager is permitted to invest in derivative investments except<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>as outlined in Section I. </div><div id="a10669" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:867.2px;">IV.<div style="display:inline-block;width:31.4px">&#160;</div>DEFINITIONS </div><div id="a10673" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:900.4px;">A.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>The following definitions apply to the terms used in this policy: </div><div id="a10677" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:933.2px;">Security &#8211;<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>An individual<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>financial instrument<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>(bond, share<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>of stock,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>note, etc.)<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.4px">&#160;</div>issued by<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>a specific </div><div id="a10681" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:950px;">company,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>government entity or<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>bank.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.4px">&#160;</div>Separate purchases of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>the same instrument<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>made at </div><div id="a10683" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:966.9px;">different times are considered one security. </div></div>
</div>
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page81" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:295.9px; height:1.6px; left:96px; top:783.8px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a10687" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:49px;">Portfolio &#8211; The total of the Company&#8217;s cash, cash equivalents, bond and equity<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>investments. </div><div id="a10692" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:81.8px;">Portfolio Division<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>&#8211; A<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>subset of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>the total<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>portfolio subject<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>to separate<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>and distinct<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>maturity and<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>duration </div><div id="a10696" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:98.8px;">limits. </div><div id="a10698" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:131.6px;">Portfolio<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>Division<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>Limit<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>&#8211;<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>maximum<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>percentage<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>portfolio<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>division<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>can<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>total </div><div id="a10703" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:148.4px;">portfolio&#8217;s value at any one time. </div><div id="a10705" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:181.3px;">Individual Security Limit &#8211;<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>The maximum percentage that<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>any security can<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>be of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>total portfolio&#8217;s </div><div id="a10710" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:198.1px;">value at the time of a new security&#8217;s purchase, regardless of portfolio division. </div><div id="a10712" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:231.1px;">Aggregate<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>Category<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>Limit<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>&#8211;<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>maximum<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>percentage<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>that<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>the<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>total<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>value<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.1px">&#160;</div>all<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>securities<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>in<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.6px">&#160;</div>a </div><div id="a10717" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:247.9px;">particular category<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>can be<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>total portfolio&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>value at<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>the time<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>of a<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>new security&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.2px">&#160;</div>purchase, </div><div id="a10718" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:264.9px;">regardless of portfolio division. </div><div id="a10720" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:297.7px;">Maturity &#8211;<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.8px">&#160;</div>The date<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.1px">&#160;</div>on which<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.7px">&#160;</div>the life<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>of a<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.8px">&#160;</div>financial instrument<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.8px">&#160;</div>ends through<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.7px">&#160;</div>cash or<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>physical settlement </div><div id="a10724" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:314.5px;">or expiration with no value.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.3px">&#160;</div>The maturity of a bond refers to the date that the debt will cease </div><div id="a10725" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:168px;top:331.5px;">to exist, at which time the issuer will redeem the bond by<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>paying<div style="display:inline-block;width:4px">&#160;</div>the principal (or face value). </div><div id="a10728" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:364.1px;">V. </div><div id="a10730" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:96px;top:364.1px;">PORTFOLIO DIVISIONS </div><div id="a10732" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:397.2px;">A.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>The<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>Company&#8217;s total<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>portfolio will<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.5px">&#160;</div>be<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>divided into<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>four<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>portfolio divisions<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>each<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>with a<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>progressively </div><div id="a10736" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:414px;">longer<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>maximum<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>maturity and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>average<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.7px">&#160;</div>duration and<div style="display:inline-block;width:7px">&#160;</div>a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>fifth<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.9px">&#160;</div>division composed<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.7px">&#160;</div>of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>any<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>investments </div><div id="a10737" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:430.8px;">described in Section VI, subsections G and H. </div><div id="a10739" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:463.8px;">B.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>The securities in<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>each of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>first four divisions<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.3px">&#160;</div>can be from<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>any of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>approved categories<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>in Section </div><div id="a10743" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:480.6px;">VI with the exception of subsections G and H. </div><div id="a10745" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:513.6px;">C.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>The portfolio in total should have an average duration of no more<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>than 2.5 years. </div><div id="a10750" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:546.4px;">D.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.3px">&#160;</div>The five portfolio divisions are defined as follows: </div><div id="a10754" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:580.4px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10755" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:126.8px;top:580.3px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:17.3px">&#160;</div>Division 1 &#8211; Liquid portfolio to meet the operating needs of the Company<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>with a maximum </div><div id="a10760" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:144px;top:597.1px;">maturity of one year.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.7px">&#160;</div>No portfolio division limit. </div><div id="a10762" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:615.1px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10763" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:126.8px;top:615px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:17.3px">&#160;</div>Division 2 &#8211; Short-term portfolio with a maximum maturity of<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>3 years and average duration of 1.5 </div><div id="a10771" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:144px;top:631.8px;">years.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.2px">&#160;</div>No portfolio division limit. </div><div id="a10773" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:649.9px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10774" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:126.8px;top:649.7px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:17.3px">&#160;</div>Division 3 &#8211; Medium-term portfolio with a maximum maturity<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>of 10 years from settlement date </div><div id="a10782" portfolio division limit of 20%. </div><div id="a10784" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:684.6px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10785" with a maximum maturity<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>of 10 years from settlement date and </div><div id="a10792" division limit of 5%. </div><div id="a10794" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:719.3px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10795" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:126.8px;top:719.2px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:17.3px">&#160;</div>Division 5 &#8211; Special investment division of equity and hedge fund investments<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>with a portfolio </div><div id="a10800" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:144px;top:736px;">division limit of 10%. </div><div id="a10803" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:768.6px;">VI.<div style="display:inline-block;width:30px">&#160;</div>AUTHORIZED INVESTMENT CATEGORIES </div><div id="a10808" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:96px;top:801.8px;">A.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>Money value<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>and which invest solely in </div><div id="a10815" id="a10818" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:853.6px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10819" P-1, or A3 by Moody&#8217;s or A- by Standard<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.7px">&#160;</div>&amp; Poor&#8217;s. </div><div id="a10827" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New capital structure; </div><div id="a10947" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:144px;top:479px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10948" $50MM. </div><div id="a10955" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:14.72px;left:120px;top:514.8px;">&#9679;</div><div id="a10956" thereunder<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>as if<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>it had<div <div id="a11937" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:48.9px;">(b) restate,<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>ratify and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.2px">&#160;</div>reaffirm<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>each and<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.3px">&#160;</div>every term<div (c) acknowledge<div style="display:inline-block;width:2px">&#160;</div>and agree<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.4px">&#160;</div>that, as<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.5px">&#160;</div>date hereof,<div style="display:inline-block;width:2.6px">&#160;</div>there exists </div><div id="a11940" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:85.7px;">no right of offset,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>defense, counterclaim or objection<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.6px">&#160;</div>in favor of the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.4px">&#160;</div>Borrower as against the<div with, the<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>laws of the </div><div id="a11949" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:175.3px;">State of style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:639.4px;">By:<div style="display:inline-block;width:312.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a12180" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:657.8px;">Title: </div><div id="a12182" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:708.3px;">[NAME OF ASSIGNEE] </div><div id="a12184" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:750.7px;">By:<div style="display:inline-block;width:312.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a12188" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:769.1px;">Title: </div><div id="a12190" Credit Commitment is being assigned. </div><div id="a12204" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:8.64px;left:48px;top:974px;">2</div><div id="a12205" an Affiliate of a Bank prior to the Effective<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.9px">&#160;</div>Date. </div></div>

<div id="a12229" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:48px;top:956px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:192px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a12210" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:48.9px;">WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.9px">&#160;</div>ASSOCIATION<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.9px">&#160;</div>,<div style="display:inline-block;width:4px">&#160;</div>as Agent </div><div id="a12213" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:91.4px;">By:<div style="display:inline-block;width:312.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a12217" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:109.8px;">Title: </div><div id="a12219" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:160.1px;">THE CATO<div style="display:inline-block;width:6px">&#160;</div>CORPORATION</div><div id="a12220" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:10.72px;left:532.6px;top:158.9px;">3</div><div id="a12222" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:202.5px;">By:<div style="display:inline-block;width:312.9px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a12226" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;left:336.1px;top:220.9px;">Title: </div><div id="a12232" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:8.64px;left:48px;top:974px;">3</div><div id="a12233" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Times New Roman&apos;;font-size:13.28px;left:52.3px;top:974.4px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:3.4px">&#160;</div>If the Assignee is not a Bank or an Affiliate of a Bank prior to the Effective<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>Date, or if no Default has occurred and is continuing. </div></div>
