<div id="fixed-layout-inline-document" style="display:none;"></div><div id="Doc1" style="background-color:RGB(230, 230, 230);line-height:normal;">
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page1" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div style="position:absolute; width:117.3px; height:1.6px; left:48px; top:165.1px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:190.6px; height:1.6px; left:48px; top:198.9px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div style="position:absolute; width:724px; height:1.9px; left:46.1px; top:347.9px; background-color:#000000; ">&#160;</div>
<div id="a3" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-weight:bold;left:683.7px;top:65.6px;">EXHIBIT 99.1 </div><div id="a7" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:116.2px;">The CATO Corporation </div><div id="a10" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:150px;">NEWS RELEASE </div><div id="a13" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-weight:bold;left:48px;top:183.7px;">FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE </div><div id="a15" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:240px;top:202.1px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:192px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a21" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:220.8px;">For Further Information Contact:</div><div id="a23" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:239.2px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:48px">&#160;</div>Charles D. Knight </div><div id="a26" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:257.6px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:48px">&#160;</div>Executive Vice President </div><div id="a29" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:276px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:48px">&#160;</div>Chief Financial Officer </div><div id="a32" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:294.4px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:48px">&#160;</div>InvestorRelations@catocorp.com </div><div id="a37" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:18.72px;font-weight:bold;left:266.9px;top:325.2px;">CATO<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.8px">&#160;</div>REPORTS 1Q EARNINGS<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.5px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a39" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:366px;">CHARLOTTE, N.C. (May 19, 2022) &#8211; The Cato Corporation (NYSE: CATO)<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>today reported net </div><div id="a45" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:384.4px;">income of $9.7 million or $0.46 per diluted share for the first quarter ended April 30, 2022, compared </div><div id="a46" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:402.8px;">to net income of $20.7 million or $0.92 per diluted share for the first quarter ended May 1, 2021.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.5px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a48" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:437.2px;">Sales for the first quarter ended April 30, 2022 were $204.9 million, or a decrease of 3% from sales of </div><div id="a49" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:455.6px;">$211.2 million for the first quarter ended May 1, 2021.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.8px">&#160;</div>The Company&#8217;s same-store sales for the </div><div id="a52" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:474px;">quarter decreased 2% compared to 2021.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.5px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a55" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:48px;top:508.4px;">"Our first quarter sales were negatively impacted by cooler, wetter weather,&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>said John Cato, </div><div id="a56" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:48px;top:526.8px;">Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer.</div><div id="a58" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:401.2px;top:526.8px;">&#8220;As anticipated, we continued to </div><div id="a59" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:632.6px;top:526.8px;">experience late </div><div id="a60" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:545.2px;">merchandise shipments, a result of the supply chain disruption and overseas COVID restrictions, </div><div id="a61" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:563.6px;">coupled with the pressure of inflation on consumers&#8217; discretionary income and intermittent store </div><div id="a62" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:582px;">closings due to the effects of the tight labor market.</div><div id="a65" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:410.1px;top:582px;">&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.4px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a67" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:48px;top:616.4px;">First-quarter gross margin decreased from 41.5% to 35.5% of sales in 2022 due to lower </div><div id="a70" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:48px;top:634.8px;">merchandise margins.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.5px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a72" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:214.4px;top:634.8px;">Selling, General and Administrative expenses as a percent of sales </div><div id="a73" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:653.2px;">decreased from 29.9% to 29.5% of sales during the quarter primarily due to decreased incentive </div><div id="a75" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:671.6px;">compensation expense, partially offset by increased payroll, reflecting more normalized operations, </div><div id="a76" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:690px;">compared to the prior year.<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.2px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a77" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;color:#333333;left:249px;top:690px;">Income tax expense for the quarter was $1.9 million compare</div><div id="a79" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:682.4px;top:690px;">d to $3.1 </div><div id="a80" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:708.4px;">million last year.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.8px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a83" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:745.1px;">&#8220;The effects of continued late merchandise shipments, inflation-related increases to our costs and </div><div id="a87" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:766.3px;">increased pressure on our customers&#8217; discretionary income are expected to remain challenging </div><div id="a88" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:787.5px;">throughout the year,&#8221; stated Mr.<div style="display:inline-block;width:6.1px">&#160;</div>Cato.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9px">&#160;</div>&#8220;As we move forward, following two years of unpredictable </div><div id="a89" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:808.6px;">business cycles, we are cautious about the remainder of the year in the face of these ongoing </div><div id="a91" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:829.7px;">uncertainties.&#8221; </div><div id="a94" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:869.4px;">During the first quarter ended April 30, 2022, the Company opened 4 stores and relocated 1 store.<div style="display:inline-block;width:4.2px">&#160;</div></div><div id="a97" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:890.5px;">As of April 30, 2022, the Company operated 1,315 stores in 32 states, compared to 1,325 stores in 32 </div><div id="a98" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:911.7px;">states as of May 1, 2021.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.8px">&#160;</div></div></div>
</div>
<div style="padding: 7px">
<div id="Page2" style="background-color:RGB(255, 255, 255);position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;overflow:hidden;border-style:solid;border-width:thin;border-color:RGB(198, 198, 198);page-break-after:always;width:816px;height:1056px;">
<div id="a103" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:49.1px;">The Cato Corporation is a leading specialty retailer of value-priced fashion apparel and accessories </div><div id="a107" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:70.2px;">operating three concepts, &#8220;Cato,&#8221; &#8220;Versona&#8221; and &#8220;It&#8217;s Fashion.&#8221;<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.8px">&#160;</div>The Company&#8217;s Cato stores offer </div><div id="a108" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:91.4px;">exclusive merchandise with fashion and quality comparable to mall specialty stores at low prices </div><div id="a110" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:112.6px;">every day.<div style="display:inline-block;width:10.1px">&#160;</div>The Company also offers exclusive merchandise found in its Cato stores at </div><div id="a111" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:133.8px;">www.catofashions.com.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.9px">&#160;</div>Versona is a unique fashion destination offering apparel and accessories </div><div id="a112" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:154.9px;">including jewelry, handbags and shoes at exceptional prices every day.<div style="display:inline-block;width:11.3px">&#160;</div>Select Versona merchandise </div><div id="a114" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:176px;">can also be found at www.shopversona.com.<div style="display:inline-block;width:9.7px">&#160;</div>It&#8217;s Fashion offers fashion with a focus on the latest </div><div id="a115" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;left:48px;top:197.3px;">trendy styles for the entire family at low prices every day. </div><div id="a118" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;color:#333333;left:48px;top:238.5px;">Statements in this press release that express a belief,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>expectation or intention, as well as those that are not a<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>historical </div><div id="a119" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;color:#333333;left:48px;top:256.3px;">fact,</div><div id="a120" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:16px;font-style:italic;left:73.1px;top:253.8px;"><div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>i</div><div id="a122" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:82.1px;top:256.3px;">ncluding, without limitation, statements regarding the Company&#8217;s<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.5px">&#160;</div>expected or estimated operational financial results, </div><div id="a123" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:272.3px;">activities or opportunities, and potential impacts and effects<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.2px">&#160;</div>of the coronavirus are considered &#8220;forward-looking&#8221; within<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a127" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:287.6px;">meaning of The Private Securities Litigation Reform Act<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.2px">&#160;</div>of 1995.<div style="display:inline-block;width:7.5px">&#160;</div>Such forward-looking statements are based on current </div><div id="a130" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:303px;">expectations that are subject to known and unknown risks,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>uncertainties and other factors that could cause actual<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>results </div><div id="a132" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:318.4px;">to differ materially from those contemplated by the forward<div style="display:inline-block;width:1.4px">&#160;</div>-looking statements.<div style="display:inline-block;width:8.1px">&#160;</div>Such factors include, but are not limited </div><div id="a136" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:333.6px;">to, any actual or perceived deterioration in the conditions<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.2px">&#160;</div>that drive consumer confidence and spending, including,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>but not </div><div id="a138" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:348.9px;">limited to, prevailing social, economic, political and public health<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>conditions and uncertainties, levels of unemployment, </div><div id="a140" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:364.3px;">fuel, energy and food costs, wage rates, tax rates, interest<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>rates, home values, consumer net worth and the availability<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.3px">&#160;</div>of </div><div id="a141" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:379.7px;">credit; changes in laws or regulations affecting our business including<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.2px">&#160;</div>but not limited to tariffs; uncertainties regarding<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>the </div><div id="a143" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:395px;">impact of any governmental action regarding, or responses<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>to, the foregoing conditions; competitive factors and pricing </div><div id="a144" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:410.2px;">pressures; our ability to predict and respond to rapidly<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>changing fashion trends and consumer demands; our ability<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>to </div><div id="a147" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:425.6px;">successfully implement our new store development strategy<div style="display:inline-block;width:5px">&#160;</div>to increase new store openings and the ability of<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>any such </div><div id="a148" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:440.9px;">new stores to grow and perform as expected; adverse weather,<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.8px">&#160;</div>public health threats (including the global coronavirus </div><div id="a149" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:456.3px;">(COVID-19) outbreak) or similar conditions that may affect<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>our sales or operations; inventory risks due to shifts<div style="display:inline-block;width:5.1px">&#160;</div>in market </div><div id="a153" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:471.7px;">demand, including the ability to liquidate excess inventory<div the </div><div id="a158" style="position:absolute;font-family:&apos;Arial&apos;;font-size:13.28px;font-style:italic;left:48px;top:502.3px;">Company files with or furnishes to the SEC from time to<div <SEQUENCE>10
<FILENAME>Show.js
<DESCRIPTION>IDEA: XBRL DOCUMENT
<TEXT>
// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */

	background-color: #def;

	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

	margin-top: 0px;
}

}

	background-color: #2F4497;
}

	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

}

	color: black;

}

	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

}
